tool_description: Extracts structured medical information from unstructured medical records, reports, and health documents for underwriting analysis.

medical_document_text.description: Raw text content of medical records or health documents

document_type.description: Type of medical document: medical_record, lab_report, discharge_summary, physician_note, specialist_report

parse_depth.description: Level of detail for parsing: basic, standard, comprehensive

error_messages: Empty document content: Provide non-empty medical_document_text for processing.
Unsupported document type: Use one of [medical_record, lab_report, discharge_summary, physician_note, specialist_report].
Invalid parse depth: Use one of [basic, standard, comprehensive].
Document parsing failed: Unable to extract meaningful medical information from the provided text.
usage: Provide the raw medical document text and specify the document type. Optionally set parse_depth for more detailed extraction. Returns structured medical data ready for further analysis.

parsed_conditions.description: List of medical conditions identified in the document

medications.description: List of medications mentioned in the document

procedures.description: List of medical procedures or treatments mentioned

dates_mentioned.description: Important dates found in the medical record

severity_indicators.description: Keywords or phrases indicating condition severity
